metadata.name: Wild Friends: Mijungla #0
metadata.description:
Sex: Male
Year Born: 2007
Year arrive at Senda Verde: 2007
Likes: Exploring his large closure and eating coconuts.
Scientific name: Tremarctos ornatus
Common name: Andean Bear
Aruma was rescued in a rural valley 5 hours drive from the city of La Paz. Some dogs chased and scared his mother, who managed to escape with one of her cubs. Unfortunately Aruma stayed behind. He was three (3) months old and the person who found him offered him for sale.

He is a 428 Lbs. (192 kls.) handsome, strong and calm bear, very attentive to who visits him.
